# Whip of Centipedes (Spell)
## Overview
[[Conjuration Spells|Conjuration]] ([[Summoning Spells|summoning]])

**Level:** [[5th Level Bard Spells|Bard 5]], [[5th Level Druid Spells|Druid 5]], [[5th Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 5]], [[5th Level Summoner Spells|Summoner 5]], [[5th Level Witch Spells|Witch 5]], [[5th Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 5]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 9th-Level Druid Spells List|Druid 9]], [[BoXM 9th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 9]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S, M/DF (a square of red cloth)

**Range:** 0 ft.

**Effect:** Whiplike swarm

**Duration:** 1 round/level (D (see text)

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** Yes

**Source:** Advanced Class Guide, pg. 199

This spell functions as *[[Whip of Spiders (Spell)|whip of spiders]]*, except it summons centipedes, and any creature you strike with the whip takes swarm damage as if it were attacked by a [[Centipede Swarm (Bestiary PF1)|centipede swarm]] (2d6 points of damage plus poison and distraction, *Bestiary* 43). If you transform the whip into a [[Centipede Swarm (Bestiary PF1)|centipede swarm]], it has 10 hit points.
